alert.note: Alert for Central Tangipahoa; East Baton Rouge; Lower Tangipahoa; Northern Livingston; Southern Livingston; St. Helena; Western Ascension (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 03 at 9:54PM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Ascension, south central St. Helena, Livingston, southwestern Tangipahoa and south central East Baton Rouge Parishes through 1030 PM CST... At 953 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Walker, or 7 miles east of Denham Springs, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hammond, Denham Springs, Ponchatoula, Walker, Livingston, French Settlement, Albany, Port Vincent, Springfield, Montpelier, Old Jefferson, Prairieville and Shenandoah. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 12 between mile markers 10 and 38. Interstate 55 in Louisiana between mile markers 28 and 32. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. The heavy rain will also lead to significantly reduced visibility along area roadways, including portions of Interstates 12 and 55. Motorists should be prepared for sudden changes in visibility if traveling through the area. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight CST for southeastern Louisiana.

area.areaDesc: Central Tangipahoa; East Baton Rouge; Lower Tangipahoa; Northern Livingston; Southern Livingston; St. Helena; Western Ascension
